attributes.action: Stop hunters posting photos of the animals they kill.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the laws which govern the social media companies in this country tightened to make it impossible for killing to be glorified and advertised.
attributes.background: I am sick and tired of reporting posts on Facebook and Instagram which show people posing with the Beautiful animals they have just killed. Why are we as civilised people allowing these murderers a forum to spread their poison and corrupt others?

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for social media providers.
